SELECT NTWRK_ID, NTWRK_IP, GTWY, SUBNET, DOMN_NM_SERVER, (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'COM067' AND CD.USE_AT = 'Y' AND MANAGE_IEM = CD.CODE) AS MANAGE_IEM, USER_NM, USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(RGSDE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS RGSDE, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNNTWRKINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND NTWRK_ID = #{ntwrkId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNNTWRKINFO (NTWRK_ID, NTWRK_IP, GTWY, SUBNET, DOMN_NM_SERVER, MANAGE_IEM, USER_NM, USE_AT, RGSDE, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{ntwrkId}, #{ntwrkIp}, #{gtwy}, #{subnet}, #{domnServer}, #{manageIem}, #{userNm}, #{useAt}, #{regstYmd}, now(), #{frstRegisterId}, now(), #{lastUpdusrId})
